argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_nnon | |- ( A e. _om -> A e. On ) |
| 2 |  | #P_limom | |- Lim _om |
| 3 | 2 | #P_jctr | |- ( _om e. On -> ( _om e. On /\ Lim _om ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_oalim | |- ( ( A e. On /\ ( _om e. On /\ Lim _om ) ) -> ( A +o _om ) = U_ x e. _om ( A +o x ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 3, 4 | #P_syl2an | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ _om e. On ) -> ( A +o _om ) = U_ x e. _om ( A +o x ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ordom | |- Ord _om |
| 7 |  | #P_nnacl | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ x e. _om ) -> ( A +o x ) e. _om ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ordelss | |- ( ( Ord _om /\ ( A +o x ) e. _om ) -> ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 9 | 6, 7, 8 | #P_sylancr | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ x e. _om ) -> ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ralrimiva | |- ( A e. _om -> A. x e. _om ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 11 |  | #P_iunss | |- ( U_ x e. _om ( A +o x ) C_ _om <-> A. x e. _om ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( A e. _om -> U_ x e. _om ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ _om e. On ) -> U_ x e. _om ( A +o x ) C_ _om ) |
| 14 | 5, 13 | #P_eqsstrd | |- ( ( A e. _om /\ _om e. On ) -> ( A +o _om ) C_ _om ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_ancoms | |- ( ( _om e. On /\ A e. _om ) -> ( A +o _om ) C_ _om ) |
| 16 |  | #P_oaword2 | |- ( ( _om e. On /\ A e. On ) -> _om C_ ( A +o _om ) ) |
| 17 | 1, 16 | #P_sylan2 | |- ( ( _om e. On /\ A e. _om ) -> _om C_ ( A +o _om ) ) |
| 18 | 15, 17 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( _om e. On /\ A e. _om ) -> ( A +o _om ) = _om ) |
